channel.title: This community in my P.O.V
channel.description:
This community, since I've been around, has been divided among various groups. Revealing qualities that can only be categorized in the most obvious manner, and show for e-genre. In the following post, I'm going to elaborate what I've learned, experienced, and how I've come realize the categories members of mitb and moparscape create.
[u][b]Noob[/b][/u] For the youngest of members, you're all slapped with a noob. Not offensively, but evidently you're all too new to take in anything from this community. You have to soak it to realize the shit you're getting into, for good and bad. (depending on you're choices)
[u][b]Non-logical[/b][/u] You're the ones that make flamers flame. It's not your fault you don't understand that Help Section means Help and Download isn't supportive of your ad-spam. Smarten up, perhaps you'll realize what you're doing to us all.
[u][b]Flamers with and without a cause[/b][/u] You've either become victim of elitist-antagonists, or your just a short tempered child that can't keep his rude comments to himself. You have the potential to lock threads, obtain numerous warnings & other dotslaps. No one did this better than the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=290956]KoF[/url].
[u][b]Postoholic[/b][/u] You probably haven't read 2 sentences of this post, and you're replying right now. You're favorite phrases are "L0l, Nice!", or "leeched", or even better "fail." You just can't wait to get your 2 cents in, even if it's only one word. It couldn't kill you to add a few more words in-- then again, why am I even telling you that, you're probably not even going to read this.
[u][b]Revolutionists[/b][/u] Ah yes. The ones looking for a [i]change[/i] in moparscape. The ones who are aware of the misconseption this community is leading. You're always insinuating modship, pleading for a difference. Fact is, no revolution has come upon moparscape, ever. You're just another twig in this tree called MoparScape, only noticed by your fellow revolutionists. How far you've come, it's never far enough.
[u][b]Elitists[/b][/u] You're the best, no doubt about it. Someone says you're a dick, it doesn't matter. Their opinion is as worthless as a pebble to you. When a mitb user enters moparscape, you're autopinned to Elitist. You control every possible outcome in these threads, you create memes, you dust the weak from these forums. But how much are you worth, when no ones behind you?
[u][b]Justice and "The Force"[/b][/u] Obviously the staff and moderators. You're our only savior, just don't let us down like this past winter. Only the best of the best are chosen because anyone else is completely unfit for their deeds. ++ for you, wait... I'm not abusing rep, please don't take mine ;]
[u][b]Omnicia[/b][/u] A majority of this group is the vets. They stick around for the past time, and give to the needy. You're here to help and that's all. Being here for as long as you've been has made you realize that all this forum needs is a little cleaning up. And you're here to teach it to them.
[u][b]Rarity ROFL.[/b][/u] Jesus Christ, once in a million years when we have that perfect solar eclipse you get that one member that sticks out for our enjoyment. I can only say I know one or two people that fall under this category. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=301255]`Worx[/url] was one of them.
[u][b]Java Addicts[/b][/u] You deserve better. You humiliate the poorly established private servers with your godly talent. Please just go back to javasun.
[u][b]The Annuals[/b][/u] You've registered. You're only here once again to see how things are, and so much has changed. You like showing your face around to see if anyone recognizes you from 6 months ago. It just goes to show the hold moparscape has on its members.
[u][b]Role Models[/b][/u] You're modest in every way. You could see someone asking what a client.java is and you'd go on for 3 paragraphs explaining to them how to make a server. You're the user that everyone looks up to, and all the fallen ones hate. You stick out like a sore thumb in threads, and everyone requests you for help. When you're in the title of a help thread, you're a part of this category.
[u][b]Lurkers[/b][/u] If there's any way to strike someone unsuspectedly, you know just how to do it. You're probably the only one who knows the answers to everything questioned in this forum, and have no drive to post. You pop in at the most random of times, only to leave us questions to our questions.
[u][b]Egomaniac[/b][/u] Your the cousin of an Elitist... You're just not an Elite. You don't think you're the one for [i]the job[/i], you know you're the one for EVERY job. You feel the need to push your limits, "above the law" if you will. You're only as good as your friend's trust, and no one likes powermad assholes. Don't worry though, anyone in this phase leaves it quickly because it usually results in a [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=266400]Ban[/url].
[u][b]MSCP Legends[/b][/u] You make things happen. One way or another you've effected this community that has changed it for better or worse. You're remembered the most, and some more than others. A lot of times you're in groups or pairs, and in more cases than once this is true. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=51753]Team-T[/url] is a good example of this. I wasn't even around when they were and I know of them. You can see examples of users of this group all over.
That's all I can think of for right now. I suppose I could pull up some more, but I have to leave.
Discuss, where do you belong?

[quote=“cocoa, post:66, topic:286850”]Noob-almost everyone
Non-logical-A good portion
Flamers with and without a cause-Everyone on occasion
Postoholic-Also everyone at a time.(was a phase for me and a couple others)
Revolutionists-MrPotatoHead, Reforced_ , Graham, others can’t think of any
Elitists-Pali, bluurr, Rich Omnicia-Mods, Vets, The Reaper Q, Jc Rarity-not Work although I didn’t know him. I would definitely say Graham.

Will do the rest later.

What do I fit under?[/quote]

wat

You’re the best, no doubt about it. Someone says you’re a dick, it doesn’t matter. Their opinion is as worthless as a pebble to you. When a mitb user enters moparscape, you’re autopinned to Elitist. You control every possible outcome in these threads, you create memes, you dust the weak from these forums. But how much are you worth, when no ones behind you?

[/quote]
